body_html:
we use github-pages, which dont support https for custom domains yet isaacs/github#156.
And the wheel files are hosted on https as well, it's just that many users with older python were having failing installs.
PyTorch is a community project, with the majority of the activity from facebook.
thanks a lot for voicing your concern, I'll keep the issue open to track this to completion at some point.

And the wheel files are hosted on https as well, it's just that many users with older python were having failing installs.
PyTorch is a community project, with the majority of the activity from facebook.

body:
we use github-pages, which dont support https for custom domains yet https://github.com/isaacs/github/issues/156.
And the wheel files are hosted on https as well, it's just that many users with older python were having failing installs.
PyTorch is a community project, with the majority of the activity from facebook.
thanks a lot for voicing your concern, I'll keep the issue open to track this to completion at some point.
